Reviews.Title: Looks great!
Reviews.Author: Adagiu2
Reviews.Content: Hi, till now looks great...I say only looks because I didn't start to use it intensively...we will se how it will move when I will install a 64Gb memory and some apps...also, i will try later on 3G...delivery was very very very fast...ordered on June 6 and delivered on 10th (from Hong Kong!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!)Recommend the seller!

ProductInfo.Features:
5.0 inch screen fit for either lady or gentlemen
quad core high-speed processor keeps your phone runs smoothly
dual sim card working at the same time with GSM and WCDMA networks
wifi, bluetooth, gps and google play store installed
HD camera for friendly use
ProductInfo.Name: Zallars MTK6589 Quad Core RAM 1G Android 4.2 OS 5.0 Inch Dual Sim 3G Smart Phone H9500
